descriptionSet.description: A collage of match-boxes with eleven different matchcovers.

inscription.text: 1 Speed 2 New Sun Lites Patang Matches 3 Extra long extra strong extra safe matches 50's Price 50 Ps. Sri Balaji Match Works, Sillangulam 4 Globe Lamba 5 100 % safe water proof by charcoalized method Only flame eminates left with charcoal No droppings on dresses Safety Matches Avg. 50 sticks price 50 Ps. Can back stroke The Yes Tee Gee Match Works Kalkurichi. 6 Twenty Seven Super Deluxe Safety Match Quality Trade mark prop.- Sundaravel Match Industries,(P) Ltd. 50's - 50 Ps. 7 Long strong safe Chemically treated sticks 8 Mahal R Super Karborised 9 50's 50 Ps. New Jothi Match Industries Pazhancottai - 627752 10 Wimco Home Lites Extra long. Extra strong. Karborised. For extra safety 11 No more burnt fingers No more danger No more wasted matches Karborised Shield of Safety 50 Match Sticks Wimco Max. Ret. Price 60p Incl. of all taxes
